LandingPage.description_paragraph_one:
Yahallo~ I'm Hima, working as a Full-Stack Software Engineer in
Singapore.
LandingPage.description_paragraph_two:
I was previously a Game Designer at a local game company developing JRPG
anime-style mobile games for two years before transitioning into Software Engineering as a
freelance Backend Engineer!
LandingPage.description_paragraph_three:
I dabble in a bit of everything in both my professional and personal capacity,
from both backend and frontend to cloud, solution architecture and DevOps, with a dash of MLOps!

NotFoundPage.title: 404 - Page Not Found
NotFoundPage.description:
You shouldn't be here! The page or whatever content you're trying to look for
 probably doesn't exist here.. yet.
